rules.description: Press ESC to close the application switcher (Cmd+Tab)
Use 's' as a modifier for symbol keys
Use 'f' as a modifier for symbol keys
Map 'a' to virtual_modifier when held and to arrow keys with HJKL
Use 'd' as a modifier for number keys
Map fn + number keys to their corresponding function keys (rev 1)
Enter acts as Right Control when held
Control acts as Escape when pressed alone
Tap Caps Lock for ESC or Hold for Control
